Second-Level: Previous experience with sound awareness technologies
description: Have used any sound awareness technologies before (SoundWatch, visual doorbell, sound recognition app,...)
Not satisfied with existing technology
Interested in better sound awareness technology
Want more details of sounds besides specific sound types
Want to know the location of sounds
Want to know the loudness of sounds
Want to know the proximity of sounds (distance, approaching/leaving)
Want to know sounds related to importance/safety/emergency
Want to know the prominent sound
Want to know social cues from sounds (e.g. emotion/tone, need to respond)
Want to know the speed of sounds
Want to know the pattern of sounds (rhythmic/repetitive/pitch/harmonic...)
Want to have levels of priority of sound awareness (important sounds first)
Prefer longer descriptions with all the details
Prefer short, precise and specific description (maybe an option for more details, but don't display all at once)
The length of the description should depend on different cases
Want customizable/different audio descriptions in different scenarios like indoor, outdoor
Concerns about the device running the technology (e.g., battery, internet)
Concerns about feeling confused because the description is inaccurate or the user can't tell whether it's correct
Concerns about the description being inappropriate or offensive
Concerns about privacy (e.g., always listening, data storage)
